oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Royal Crown Cola - 1948-01-03 - Excerpts // Weatherhouse - 1948-01-03 - Excerpt
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Excerpts from a Royal Crown Cola sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment (9:00-9:30 pm) from January 3, 1948. Featuring Louie Buck (host), and performers Roy Acuff and his Smoky Mountain Boys. Followed by an excerpt from a Weatherhouse sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment (10:15-10:30 pm) from January 3, 1948. Featuring David Cobb (host), and performers Roy Acuff and his Smoky Mountain Boys. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Roy Acuff; Smoky Mountain Boys;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Pins And Needles (In My Heart) (Roy Acuff and his Smoky Mountain Boys) -- [break] -- Roy Acuff talks -- This World Can't Stand Long (Roy Acuff and his Smoky Mountain Boys) -- [break] -- David Cobb introduces Roy Acuff -- Unloved And Unclaimed (Roy Acuff and his Smoky Mountain Boys)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Grand ole opry (Radio program); Acuff, Roy; Smoky Mountain Boys; Buck, Louis, 1910-1971; Cobb, David (Announcer);
